values: 主席；（公司等的）董事长；（委员会的）委员长；（会议的）主持人；议长

word_group.brief_definition: 副主席；副会长；副董事长
董事长；委员会主席；理事会主席
新任主席；新选的主席；新董事长
面无表情的主席；不苟言笑的主席；一本正经的主席
面无表情的主席；一本正经的议长

bilingual.source: Chairman Mao Zedong wrote an article in memory of him, in which he praised Dr Bethune as a hero to be remembered in China.
bilingual.target: 毛泽东主席写了一篇纪念他的文章，称赞白求恩医生是中国值得铭记的英雄。

bilingual.source: The chairman called the meeting to order.

bilingual.target: 他作为主席参加了会议。

bilingual.source: He was duly elected as the new chairman.
bilingual.target: 他被适当地选为新主席。
荣誉的主席出席了仪式。

bilingual.source: The chairman gave a speech at the meeting.
bilingual.target: 主席在会议上发表了讲话。

bilingual.source: They will elect a new chairman next month.
bilingual.target: 他们将在下个月选出新主席。

bilingual.source: The chairman announced the new company policy.
bilingual.target: 主席宣布了公司的新政策。

yingyinNormal.en: We are in active litigation at this moment, Mr. Chairman...
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们此刻正在进行积极的上诉，主席先生。

yingyinNormal.en: Hello, I'm Jack Ma, founder and chairman of Alibaba Group.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大家好，我是马云，阿里巴巴集团的创始人和董事会主席。

yingyinNormal.en: As of today, that ends. Mr. Chairman, we ask for sanctions.
yingyinNormal.zh: 到今天为止，就此了结。主席先生，我请求制裁。

yingyinNormal.en: Thank you, Mr. Chairman. Mrs. Underwood, allow me to get specific.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢谢，主席先生，安德伍德夫人，我细说一下。

yingyinNormal.en: We'd like Mr Carson to be Chairman of our Committee. But surely, His Lordship?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们想让卡森先生担任委员会主席。可是，老爷。

yingyinNormal.en: Ed Woolard, former CEO of DuPont, has joined Apple as Chairman of the Board.
yingyinNormal.zh: 艾德 伍拉德，杜邦的前CEO加入苹果成为董事主席

yingyinNormal.en: A throwback to an era without transparency and without oversight. Mr. Chairman.
yingyinNormal.zh: 简直就像一个体制没有透明公开和监管不利时代的产物。主席先生。

yingyinNormal.en: Evelyn Rand. You know Crazy Hat? I know she's the chairman of the board of Rand Industries.
yingyinNormal.zh: 艾芙琳·兰德。你认识小疯帽？她是兰德实业的董事会主席。

yingyinNormal.en: How could he do that? The board's chairman is my daughter, Hope. She was the deciding vote.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他怎么做到的？董事会主席是我的女儿，霍普，她投了决定票。

yingyinNormal.en: You missed Chief Science Officer, Chairman of the Board, and Head of the Secret Santa Committee.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你还少说了首席科技官，董事局主席以及秘密圣诞委员会首脑。

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. Chairman, the so call Impossible Missions Force is not just a rogue organization, it is an outdated one.
yingyinNormal.zh: 主席先生，这个所谓的碟中谍小组不仅肆意妄为，而且观念过时。

yingyinNormal.en: Ladies and Gentlemen, please welcome the founder and the executive chairman of Alibaba group, Mr. Jack Ma.
yingyinNormal.zh: 女生们，先生们，有请阿里巴巴的创始人以及执行主席，马云先生。

yingyinNormal.en: The time has come to dissolve the IMF. Mr. Chairman. And transfer the salvageable assets to the CIA.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是时候解散碟中谍小组了。主席先生。然后把其资源和人员调拨给中情局。

yingyinNormal.en: That's why we're here to see you, m'lord. But we'd also like to offer the position of Chairman of our Committee to…
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是我们来见您的原因，老爷但我们还想将委员会主席一职交给...

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. Chairman, the IMF has operated without oversight for 40 years. Now, are its methods unorthodox?
yingyinNormal.zh: 主席先生，碟中谍小组这四十年来都在没有监管的情况下运作的，它的方式是不是不正规呢？

yingyinNormal.en: I mean, Mr. Chairman. Miss Sharma, you conducted investigative work on Heather Sorrentino's suit against Decatur Firearms? Yes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 主席先生，夏尔马小姐，你负责过希瑟·索伦蒂诺起诉迪凯特枪械案的调查，是吗？是的。

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. Chairman, this invoice proves that Kalinda Sharma was engaged directly by the client, and therefore her notes are our client property.
yingyinNormal.zh: 主席先生，这张发票证明凯琳达·夏尔马由委托人直接雇用，因此她的记录是我委托人的财产。

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. Chairman, the IMF's misadventures date back to my earliest days in the CIA when the IMF broke into the CIA to steal a list of covert operatives.
yingyinNormal.zh: 主席先生，碟中谍小组的违规行为都可以追溯到我刚到中央情报局的时候，当时他们潜入中情局窃取我们的一份秘密特工名单。

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. Chairman, we need all these case files so that we can properly represent the client's interests, and Mr. Gardner and Ms. Lockhart are actively delaying...
yingyinNormal.zh: 主席先生，我们需要所有的案件卷宗，这样我们才能完全代表委托人的利益，加德纳先生和洛克哈特女士在故意拖延...

yingyinNormal.en: Yes. Mr. Chairman. Are its results less than perfect? Absolutely. But without the IMF, to be force... There'll be order and stability. Without the IMF...
yingyinNormal.zh: 是的，主席先生。结果是不是有时也不尽完美呢？当然会但是没有碟中谍小组，我们只好... 我们就会有稳定和秩序。没有碟中谍小组...

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Chris Humphries, <highlight>chairman</highlight> of the group, said that poor maths skills can affect an individual's life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该组织主席克里斯·汉弗莱斯表示，糟糕的数学能力会影响一个人的一生。

examination_example.sentence: Indra Nooyi, PepsiCo <highlight>chairman</highlight>, said the plan to make its products healthier was important for the company's growth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 百事公司董事长Indra Nooyi表示，让产品更健康的计划对公司的发展很重要。

examination_example.sentence: Either the <highlight>chairman</highlight> or the director of graduate studies serves for at least the first semester as a new student adviser.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 主席或研究生学习主任至少在第一学期担任新的学生顾问。

examination_example.sentence_trans: 蒂特顿是欧米茄乐团的主席，但在过去4年里，他一直是该乐团的官方翻谱员。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Chairman</highlight> Mao once said that women could hold up half the sky.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 毛主席曾经说过，妇女能顶半边天。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Chairman</highlight> Mao said during the interview with a German reporter in 1938.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 毛主席在1938年接受德国记者采访时说。

examination_example.sentence: Alan Boss is the <highlight>chairman</highlight> of a group for outer space research.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 艾伦·博丝是一个外层空间研究组织的主席。
